game.title: The Lost City of Gold
game.objective: Finding the lost city and retrieving its treasure.
game.description: A legendary city filled with gold and treasures has been lost for centuries, and it's up to you to find it. The city is hidden deep in the jungle, and the path is treacherous.

task.objective: Meet with Gilbert in his hut.
task.description: He will give you a map that will lead you to the lost city.

task.objective: Finding the entrance to the jungle.
task.description: The path to the jungle is hidden behind a waterfall. You will need to find it.
